archimate:Requirement.name: AU-6(3): Audit Record Review, Analysis, and Reporting | Correlate Audit Record Repositories
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Analyze and correlate audit records across different repositories to gain organization-wide situational awareness.

properties.value: Organization-wide situational awareness includes awareness across all three levels of risk management (i.e., organizational level, mission/business process level, and information system level) and supports cross-organization awareness.
